mapper.sql: id, parent_id, topic_id, content, is_delete, create_time, last_update_time, create_by, last_update_by
mapper.select: select b.id as id, b.content as content, b.create_time as createTime, ifnull(us.username, '') as userName, ifnull(us.avatar, '') as avatar, b.is_delete as isDelete from comment as b left join `user` as us on us.id = b.create_by where b.topic_id = #{topicId} and b.parent_id = 0 order by b.create_time desc limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
